NoobList.org

  alpha

Start learning from the best contents.

Manifesto

Because every expert starts as a noob.

Each person has the potential to become an expert. This is the purpose of NoobList : to give advice on the content with which you should start learning. Better is the content you learning from, better will be your knowledge.

NoobList is a participative educational resources platform.

The concept is simple : the NoobList community vote for best contents on a discipline. This list is published on the NoobList.org for everyone and for free. Because we know that sharing is the first step to the knowledge.

We believe that knowledge is build together.

With NoobList, everybody can send a content on a discipline. The content will be reviewed by the community for an approuval. If 80% of the community consider the content as relevant, it will be added to the NoobList of the discipline.

“Knowledge is Power, Power provides Information; Information leads to Education, Education breeds Wisdom, Wisdom is Liberation.
People are not liberated because of lack of knowledge.”
- Israelmore Ayivor

We are in early-stage of the project, we currently collect discipline contents for reviewal.
Be a part of NoobList and help noobs to level up by sharing your best learning content.
